import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; const Scorecard = ({ type, inningsNumber, data, show }) => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); // Handle visibility changes useEffect(() => { if (show) { setIsVisible(true); } else { // When hiding, let the animation complete first const timer = setTimeout(() => { setIsVisible(false); }, 300); // Match this with exit animation duration return () => clearTimeout(timer); } }, [show]); // Early return if no data and not visible if (!data || (!isVisible && !show)) return null; console.log(`Scorecard render:`, { type, inningsNumber, data }); // Calculate top position based on type const getTopPosition = () => { switch (type) { case 'batting': return 'top-[240px]'; case 'bowling': return 'top-[240px]'; case 'partnerships': return 'top-[240px]'; case 'fallOfWickets': return 'top-[240px]'; default: return 'top-[240px]'; } }; const renderPartnershipAndFow = (partnerships, fow) => { if (!partnerships?.length && !fow?.length) return null; return (
{/* Partnerships Section */}
PARTNERSHIPS
BATTER 1
BATTER 2
RUNS
BALLS
SR
{data.partnerships?.map((p, index) => (
{p.player1}
{p.player2}
{p.runs}
{p.balls}
{((p.runs / p.balls) * 100).toFixed(2)}
))}
{/* Fall of Wickets Section */}
FALL OF WICKETS
NO
BATSMEN
SCR
OVR
{data.fallOfWickets?.map((w, index) => (
{w.wicketNumber}
{w.shortName}
{w.score}
{w.over}
))}
); }; const renderContent = () => { switch (type) { case 'batting': return (
{/* Title Section */}
{/* Header Row with Title and Summary */}
{data.teamName} - BATTING
{/* Batting Table */}
{/* Table Headers */}
BATTER
R
B
4S
6S
DISMISSAL
SR
{/* Batting Rows */}
{data.batting.map((batter, index) => (
{batter.name}
{batter.runs ?? '-'}
{batter.balls ?? '-'}
{batter.fours ?? '-'}
{batter.sixes ?? '-'}
{batter.dismissal?.split(' ').map((word, i, arr) => ( {word} {i < arr.length - 1 && } ))}
{batter.strikeRate ?? '-'}
))}
{/* Extras and Total Row */}
Extras: {data.summary.extras.total} (W: {data.summary.extras.wide}, NB: {data.summary.extras.noBall}, B: {data.summary.extras.bye}, LB: {data.summary.extras.legBye})
Total: {data.summary.score}/{data.summary.wickets} ({data.summary.overs} overs)
{renderPartnershipAndFow(data.partnerships, data.fallOfWickets)}
); case 'bowling': return (
{/* Title Section */}
{data.teamName} - BOWLING
{/* Bowling Table */}
{/* Table Headers */}
BOWLER
O
M
R
W
WD
NB
ECO
{/* Bowling Rows */}
{data.bowling.map((bowler, index) => (
{bowler.name}
{bowler.overs}
{bowler.maidens}
{bowler.runs}
{bowler.wickets}
{bowler.wides}
{bowler.noBalls}
{bowler.economy}
))}
); case 'details': return (
{/* Title Section */}
{/* Main Title */}
{data.teamName} - PARTNERSHIPS & FALL OF WICKETS
{/* Content */}
{/* Partnerships Section */}
PARTNERSHIPS
BATTER 1
BATTER 2
RUNS
BALLS
SR
{data.partnerships?.map((p, index) => (
{p.player1}
{p.player2}
{p.runs}
{p.balls}
{((p.runs / p.balls) * 100).toFixed(2)}
))}
{/* Fall of Wickets Section */}
FALL OF WICKETS
NO
BATSMEN
SCR
OVR
{data.fallOfWickets?.map((w, index) => (
{w.wicketNumber}
{w.shortName}
{w.score}
{w.over}
))}
); default: return
Unknown section type: {type}
; } }; // Update the variants with exit animations const variants = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: -30, scale: 0.99, }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1, transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: [0.23, 1, 0.32, 1], staggerChildren: 0.05 } }, exit: { opacity: 0, y: 20, // Exit downwards scale: 0.98, transition: { duration: 0.2, ease: [0.23, 1, 0.32, 1] } } }; // Add exit animations for children const childVariants = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: -10 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.2 } }, exit: { opacity: 0, y: 10, transition: { duration: 0.15 } } }; // Add fade out for backdrop const backdropVariants = { initial: { opacity: 0, backdropFilter: 'blur(0px)' }, animate: { opacity: 0.95, backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', transition: { duration: 0.3 } }, exit: { opacity: 0, backdropFilter: 'blur(0px)', transition: { duration: 0.2, delay: 0.1 // Slight delay to let content exit first } } }; return ( <> {(isVisible || show) && ( // Check both states <> {/* Backdrop */} {/* Main container */}
{/* Background */}
{/* Content */} { // Optional: Do something when animation completes console.log('Animation completed'); }}> {renderContent()}
)} {/* Keep existing styles */} ); }; export default Scorecard;
